Name: The Handy Physics Answer Book (The Handy Answer Book Series)

ReviewList.Text: Vert interesting. Easy to read for people of any age. My kids, ages 9 and 10 love it. My husband and I, ages 43 and 38, are reading it for fun

This book is makes a good introduction to the laws of physics. If you expect more than an introduction you will be disappointed, it is not a collage course book. If you get the book for its designed purpose you should be happy with your purchase. I look forward to reading the other books in the series as I get them.
Great purchase at a great price!
My sister put me on to this book.  I'm not very interested in physics, but this book made me want to read more like it.
